name: 8 Questions
description:
the theme i chose for LD34 was growing. the way i wanted to interpret it is in the sense of how relationships grow in different ways, and based on seemingly minor or significant decisions. the distance between people can grow without you knowing why or how, or what either of you said to make it happen. and we never know it at the time - that's why the meters are unlabeled (yes it's by design).

if you find my stuff interesting, follow me on twitter for more of my work: @keanerie! i'm making a game with a shiba inu.
